alert.note: Alert for Coastal Taylor; Inland Taylor; Lafayette; Madison (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 10 at 12:26AM EST by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of western Lafayette, Taylor and southeastern Madison Counties through 100 AM EST... At 1226 AM EST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Blue Springs to 11 miles northeast of Perry to 20 miles southeast of St. Marks. Movement was southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Mayo, Perry, Lee, Pinland, Jug Island, Buckville, Dekle Beach, Jack Lee Island, Foley, Salem, Perry-Foley Airport, San Pedro Junction, Hampton Springs, Cedar Island, Fish Creek, Cooks Hammock, Chancey, Secotan, Boyd and Smith. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Taylor; Inland Taylor; Lafayette; Madison
